Text: Party DateWill Saturday Feb th work for your and Alinas busy schedule CBaily

I sure enjoyed dinner last night ice tea and all For what it is worth I believe you made the right choice recognizing it was not an easy one Your judgment is sound and you should believe in it I hope you are feeling more confident in your choice now Thanks for your words of wisdom to me I am admittedly a bit scared since I cannot control this situation very much Just how did we get to be so Type A Have a wonderful trip I will have my cell phone with me if you need to reach me Also the contact information for our condo in Jackson Hole is Jackson Hole Racquet Club at the Aspens main reservations number Take care C
How to be beautiful all the time

FW Fw FW Fw Please Do Not Break ThisHappy Valentines and try not to cry when you read this In memory of all those who perished the passengers and the pilots on the United Air and AA flights the workers in the World Trade Center and the Pentagon and all the innocent bystanders Our prayers go out to the friends and families of the deceased If I Knew If I knew it would be the last time That Id see you fall asleep I would tuck you in more tightly and pray the Lord your soul to keep If I knew it would be the last time that I see you walk out the door I would give you a hug and kiss and call you back for one more If I knew it would be the last time Id hear your voice lifted up in praise I would video tape each action and word so I could play them back day after day If I knew it would be the last time I could spare an extra minute to stop and say I love you instead of assuming you would KNOW I do If I knew it would be the last time I would be there to share your day well Im sure youll have so many more so I can let just this one slip away For surely theres always tomorrow to make up for an oversight and we always get a second chance to make everything just right There will always be another day to say I love you and certainly theres another chance to say our Anything I can do But just in case I might be wrong and today is all I get Id like to say how much I love you and I hope we never forget Tomorrow is not promised to anyone young or old alike And today may be the last chance you get to hold your loved one tight So if youre waiting for tomorrow why not do it today For if tomorrow never comes youll surely regret the day That you didnt take that extra time for a smile a hug or a kiss and you were too busy to grant someone what turned out to be their one last wish So hold your loved ones close today and whisper in their ear Tell them how much you love them and that youll always hold them dear Take time to say Im sorry Please forgive me Thank you or Its okay And if tomorrow never comes youll have no regrets about today Send this to at least people to show your support DONT BREAK IT PLEASE

Weekend PlansAlthough it is only Tuesday I am already trying to plan for the weekend Johns brother Gib is visiting us and we were hoping to see you sans Kim on Saturday for dinner at Lupes How is it going in Kims absence If I can assist in any way please let me know C

Coffee Time TomorrowHi I hope your week has gone well Im checking in to see if you have time tomorrow afternoon to meet for coffee or to otherwise get together John and I are doing some yardwork in the morning and he and Miss B will go to his hockey game in the afternoon thus Illb be free then Take care C

Lunch plansHi I hope you enjoyed the rest of your weekend The weather was simply beautiful We did some extensive yardwork Luckily we didnt plant much since it is supposed to be chilly this week Brianna and I loved the singalong Sound of Music It was great fun Id go again next weekend Let me know which day is best for us to have lunch Wednesday or Thursday C

Thanks so much for lunch yesterday I looked up Nancy Klines info She is a nurse practitioner who also has a PhD a real underachiever Im actually working with Mark Kline on their idea for an Ambassador Doll We are trademarking it Have a good day CB

Point to ponderOne day three men were hiking and unexpectedly came upon a large raging violent river They needed to get to the other side but had no idea of how to do so The first man prayed to God saying Please God give me the strength to cross this river Poof God gave him big arms and strong legs and he was able to swim across the river in about two hours after almost drowning a couple of times Seeing this the second man prayed to God saying Please God give me the strength and the tools to cross this river Poof God gave him a rowboat and he was able to row across the river in about an hour after almost capsizing the boat a couple of times The third man had seen how this worked out for the other two so he also prayed to God saying Please God give me the strength and the toolsand the intelligence to cross this river And poof God turned him into a woman She looked at the map hiked upstream a couple of hundred yards then walked across the bridge SEND THIS TO A SMART WOMAN WHO NEEDS A LAUGH AND TO THE GUYS YOU THINK CAN HANDLE IT

FW RE Coming Home SoonHello Are you there I am planning to get the invites this weekend Are you going to Austin Original Message From Jewell Cyndi M Sent Tuesday January PM To Shelley A Corman Email Subject FW RE Coming Home Soon Heres your list I still need addresses Would you mind terribly if I invite Patsy She really wants to meet Alina CBaily Original Message From mailto Sent Friday January PM To Subject RE RE Coming Home Soon Thanks I will be so glad to be home I have a degree fever today and am counting the minutes til I board that plane The shower idea sounds fun I would prefer a girl shower if thats okay Clothes would be my preferred gift she wears a T or T She is very short for her age but nearly normal girth Medium at Gymboree fits her fine The th wont work though because its my brother in law Troys th birthday in Austin So hopefully there is another day Potential List Cyndi Rosemary Christi Michele Turkington Andrea Flynn Anita Kudla Cindy Dick Vicki Smith Karen Ferrazi Gina Taylor Debbie Thompson Rosalia Nolan Peggy Holmes Lynn Blair Donna Scott Sheila Nacey This list includes a few ladies that work for me last names But otherwise I decided to skip too many work or church friends I think a small gathering would be more fun Jewell Cyndi M wrote I have a call into Dr Stewarts office now and will let you know as soon as I have more info I cannot wait to see you and Alina at Starbucks very soon Not to put any pressure on you but Rosemary and I have been fervently exchanging emails planning Alinas welcome shower girls only for Saturday noon pm is this OK Also I will need a list of invitees from you not like you have anything else to do right Original Message From mailto Sent Friday January AM To Subject RE Coming Home Soon I hope to be home on Sunday evening Kim will stay behind to complete the process with Alina Since I stopped taking my antibiotics my sinus infection is back and Im already miserable even prior to hours of flying If you have a chance could you do me a huge favor and call Dr Stewarts office and see if they can see me on Monday afternoon Tues or Wed Or perhaps his nurse could call some alternative antibiotic not in the bactrim or penicillin families in to my pharmacy Walgreens block of Memorial I owe you Starbucks for all the favors Ive asked of you in the last several months Happy New Year Hopefully Ill be talking to you on Monday

Shower plansHi The invites are nearly ready to go I just need the map to Rosemarys home Also Shelley we discussed that you may want to direct people to certain things or places for gifts eg books Let me know what you the invite to say and if clothes are still an option remind me what sizes Thanks CBaily
